name: Slimey Saga
description:
Slimey Saga - a 2D pixel art game where you play as a cute little slime making its way through a series of treacherous cave systems!

As you journey deeper into the caves be careful, because they are full of dangers. Spikes, acid pits, and moving saw blades will test your skills and reflexes. You'll need to use all of your abilities to avoid these hazards and make it to the end of each level.

Along the way, you'll also collect power-ups which can give you temporary boosts like increased speed or jump height.

With its charming pixel art graphics and addictive gameplay, "Slimey Saga" is sure to keep you entertained for hours.
